sentences.sentence: It takes just 1.5 kilowatt-hours (5.4 M J) energy to rotate the Wheel -roughly the same as boiling eight small domestic kettles of water.
sentences.translation: 转动轮子只需要1.5千瓦时（5.4兆焦耳）的能量，这与使用8壶家用小水壶的能量大致相同。

sentences.sentence: Burning one ton of rubbish can produce more than 400 kilowatt hours (度) of electricity.
sentences.translation: 烧一吨垃圾可以产生超过400度的电力。
一千瓦，两千瓦，然后是三千瓦。
